adHeader: Art n Motion Children's Art Lessons
adDetails: Children's Art Lessons When: Monday-Friday Time: To Be Arranged 8:00-3:00 (1 hour lessons) Where: My Evergreen home studio Who: 2 - 13 years old Fee: $10.00 per class/per participant *All materials & supplies are included in the class Art n Motion strives to provide a visual arts program that encourages your child's creativity and self-expression. We develop young children's art awareness and inspire, enrich, and reward them with hands-on art experience through drawing, painting and arts and crafts. The mature students will be introduced to art appreciation, art history, elements/principles of art, and multi-cultural art while challenging their artistic skills. Miss Helen Art n Motion show contact info show contact info Miss Helen received her BA degree in Art Education from San Jose State University in 1990. She is currently a teacher's aide and host children's art workshops in the San Jose Libraries. She has 3 children and resides in the beautiful Evergreen Community.
